Advice
The main difference between the current results and the data of
Sumner
et al. (2014) is that here we found no significant association between exaggerated advice in news and press releases (
Figure 3).

However, the overall rate of exaggeration was lower (outside the 95% CI of Sumner
et al., see
Figure 2).
